column2: ENGLISH
Tribal Raid on §Y$TITLE$§!
$ORDER$$FIRST_ADJ$ Raid Upon $SECOND$
Tribes do not bother with just causes - might makes right! §Y$CLAIMANT$§! can invade the §Y$TITLE$§!. If successful, we will demand tribute.

Conquer Ruler

With the world shattered by mysterious forces it is ripe for the taking. Might shall make right.
